DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare 6 % hydroxyethyl starch ( HES ) 130/0.4 balance electrolyte solution ( Volulyte® ) modify fluid gelatin ( Geloplasma® ) prim solution cardiopulmonary bypass ( CPB ) circuit . The microvascular reactivity effect tissue ( StO2 ) cerebral ( ScO2 ) oxygen saturation examine use near-infrared spectroscopy ( NIRS ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Hydroxyethylstarch 6 % 130/0.4 Balanced Electrolyte Solution ( Volulyte® ) Compared Gelatine ( Geloplasma® ) Microvascular Reactivity Tissue Oxygen Saturation During Haemodilution Measured With Near-infrared Spectroscopy
DOC.criteria: Adult consent patient schedule elective coronary artery bypass graft surgery moderately hypothermic ( > 32°C ) CPB without blood transfusion . Age ≥ 18 year . Exclusion criterion ejection fraction < 25 % , know allergy HES , admission HES gelatine within precede 2 week , renal insufficiency ( creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl ) , significant hepatic disease ( liver function test > 3x upper limit normal ) , history cerebrovascular disease , significant carotid artery stenosis ( > 60 % ) , perioperative use corticosteroid , need vasopressor inotropic therapy surgery . An expected haematocrit CPB , calculate base preoperative haematocrit , calculate blood volume amount cardioplegia , < 23 % also consider exclusion criterium
